items.sentence: How much longer will we have to wait for Tom?
How was I to know that I'd regret doing that?
These lemon and almond tarts are scrumptious.
I seem to have left my umbrella on the train.
We're pleased with the way things turned out.
Tom said Mary was enjoying herself in Boston.
I wonder if Tom stayed in Boston last summer.
I wonder if Tom really wants to go to Boston.

I wonder how Tom is planning to go to Boston.
I haven't lived in Boston as long as Tom has.
Tom told me that French isn't very difficult.

I want to know whether you've heard from Tom.
